_header: Come home dear heart from tarying
_description: A love cycle — fifty-one lines in four groups each of three stanzas of 5, 3, and 5 lines.

CULFf16.First Lines:
Welcome be ye my souereineThe cause of my Ioyfull
                    peine…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…To him euere with Ioye or peineLett him haue therof
                    repentance
